title: Define Task for Text Capture
content:
Fill the form on this page to define the task.

Task Name: Provide a name to identify your task/analysis. This name will be used in Task Manager and output folders (Task Name + Input Folder Name = Output Folder Name).

Selected Input Folder: The input folder you selected for this task. Click Select Folder button to select a different folder.

Select Taxon Group:Select a taxon group relevant to your input. System will use the resources (e.g., glossary) relevant to your taxon group in the process.

Use Empty Glossary: Use this option when none of the Taxon Groups is relevant to your input files.
